amendatorysection.catchline: Intermediate care facility for persons with developmental disabilities, defined.
amendatorysection.para: Intermediate care facility for persons with developmental disabilities means a facility where shelter, food, and training or habilitation services, advice, counseling, diagnosis, treatment, care, nursing care, or related services are provided for a period of more than twenty-four consecutive hours to four or more persons residing at such facility who have a developmental disability.
